sentences.english: Consider the recent opening of the new, expanded Fairview Container Terminal at the Port of Prince Rupert.
sentences.chinese: 最近在魯伯特王子島港新開通了怡景集裝箱轉運站。

sentences.english: For porters working at transfer posts, Spring Festival is the busiest time.
sentences.chinese: 在轉運站裏面工作的搬運工們過年的時候是最累的。

sentences.english: Taipei main station is a big transportation.
sentences.chinese: 臺北車站是一個很大的轉運站。

sentences.english: Construct and operate a grease trap waste treatment facility (GTWTF) within West Kowloon Transfer station.
sentences.chinese: 於西九龍廢物轉運站興建及運作隔油池廢物處理設施。

sentences.english: The RTS range provides control for the whole range of DC motors.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾轉運站範圍提供的直流電動機控制整個範圍。

sentences.english: Thus Lisbon became a big transfer post.
sentences.chinese: 里斯本變成了一個大的轉運站。
